name: Falcon Blade
description: An enchanted blade that long ago raised a hopeless urchin from pauper to king.

recentChanges.description: Increased attack damage bonus from 12 to 14.
Increased Recipe cost from 225 to 250 (total cost increases from 1100 to 1125).
Increased attack damage bonus from 10 to 12. Increased health bonus from 175 to 200.
